item.title: S16 Ep71: TRUE CRIME TUESDAY SPECIAL: The Wonderland Murders w/ Michael Connelly
item.itunes:title: TRUE CRIME TUESDAY SPECIAL: The Wonderland Murders w/ Michael Connelly
item.description:
Darkness Radio is giving you a little taste of True Crime Tuesday as we investigate The Wonderland Murders with guest Michael Connelly

Though it happened in 1981, the aftermath of the Wonderland Murders spans decades with characters, details, subplots and investigative twists that prove the truth-is-stranger-than-fiction adage, including: Hollywood underworld’s most violent drug kingpin; three murder trials with zero convictions; a bribed juror and accusations of a corrupt federal agent; the birth of the crack cocaine epidemic; the investigators being investigated themselves, the Black Guerilla Family; the biggest porn actor of his generation, John Holmes, not to mention wild claims about the drug use of many major celebrities; a Boston mafia Don; and finally, the story of a quick-buck televangelist who was supposed to be in witness protection when he ended up on the floor of a Florida motel shot in the face and left for dead...

Check out the new 8 part series here: https://adbl.co/3drwsIa

Subscribe to True Crime Tuesday here:  stitcherpremium.com/darkness

Follow Darkness Radio YouTube channel: https://bit.ly/35Y8f8c

item.title: S16 Ep65: Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts : The Curious Case of Bishop Pike w/ Mark Anthony
item.itunes:title: Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts : The Curious Case of Bishop Pike w/ Mark Anthony
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts : The Curious Case of Bishop Pike with guest Mark Anthony 

Dave digs deep into a case, a man and his haunted history and unusual death that fascinated Dr. Hans Holzer. Tonight Mark Anthony joins us to discuss the enigma and Curious Case of Bishop Pike. 

Baffling, incredible things happened in the apartment of Bishop James A. Pike after the suicide of his son, Jim Jr. Objects connected with young Jim moved around the apartment by unseen hands, clock hands swung and stopped at the hour of Jim's death, the thermostat moved up while the residents were away, to make the apartment as warm as Jim had liked it! 

Were these events the fantasy of Dr. Pike's mind? Were they a cruel hoax? Were they attempts by his deceased son to contact the father from the spirit world, as the renowned Episcopal bishop came to believe? Or was there something else at work here, something that would lead to his mysterious death in Israel and did he reach out from the great beyond to share the secrets?

Visit Mark Anthony here: www.AfterlifeFrequency.com

Get Dr. Holzer's book The Psychic World of Bishop Pike here: https://amzn.to/3pFSFat

item.title: S16 Ep59: Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts: The Ghost of Ocean Born Mary
item.itunes:title: Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts: The Ghost of Ocean Born Mary
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts: The Ghost of Ocean Born Mary with guests Shane Pittman & Chris Cagle

Dave Schrader welcomes fellow castmate Shane Pittman and episode producer Chris Cagle as they return to the high seas in one of the teams favorite hauntings from Holzer Files Season 1, Episode 7 - Legends & Lies!

When Dr. Hans Holzer was called to investigate the legend and reported haunting of the famed Ocean Born Mary House, he knew something was wrong, facts and information from the other side were not lining up and he refused to put his stamp of approval on this story to claim it was haunted by an enigmatic couple, the spirits of Ocean Born Mary or Black Bart the pirate. Tonight we take a deeper dive into one of the most enigmatic cases the team ever worked on.

The team revives Hans Holzer's investigation of the Ocean-Born Mary House in Henniker, New Hampshire. They boldly wade into the dark waters of New England folklore in search of the elusive truth behind the mysterious haunting.

item.title: S16 Ep56: Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts: The Haunting of Lambert Castle
item.itunes:title: Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts: The Haunting of Lambert Castle
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts: The Haunting of Lambert Castle Season with guests Barbara Davide & April Busset.

Dave Schrader, lead investigator of The Holzer Files revisits this strange case from Patterson, NJ. A case that eluded Hans Holzer in life. Dr. Holzer was made aware of the case through a letter he had received from Barbara Davide. Ms. Davide stumbled upon the castle quite by accident and was stupefied to realize that she had been there before, but only in her dreams. She knew and understood the layout of the house as though she had lived there her whole life, she also knew some of it's secrets but had no way to account for that knowledge, that is why she sought the help of Dr. Holzer.

Try as he might, Dr. Holzer was never able to make it to Lambert Castle, things would always happen to keep him from getting to his destination and uncovering the truth. Dave, Cindy and Shane set their sights on finishing what Dr. Holzer could not seem to get started and were blown away by the accounts of activity, the strange family history, and the mystery that would tie Barbara Davide to this house. Tonight, we discuss this case with Barbara Davide, and a witness of the ghostly antics of the house, April Busset. This is a case of hauntings, forbidden memories, possible reincarnation and unsettled spirits.

For more info on Lambert Castle: www.LambertCastle.org

Visit April here: www.IntuitiveApril.com

Order Barbara Davide's book: https://www.amazon.com/dp/1686796730?ref=exp_darknessradiodave_dp_vv_d

item.description:
Darkness Radio presents A Knock in the Attic: True Ghost Stories & Other Spine-chilling Paranormal Adventures with John Russell

John Russell has been a highly regarded professional psychic for almost fifty years, reading for thousands of clients in over thirty countries around the world. As a paranormal investigator, he has physically experienced over eight hundred paranormal manifestations. A Knock in the Attic: True Ghost Stories & Other Spine-chilling Paranormal Adventures is his story, not only about his psychic awakening and the abundance of mind-blowing otherworldly confrontations he's experienced but also about the point at which he lost his faith and gave up on himself, his psychic gifts, and the beings on the Other Side. But they, didn't give up on him.

item.title: S16 Ep53: I've Seen Dead People: Diary of a Deputy Coroner w/Donna Francart
item.itunes:title: I've Seen Dead People: Diary of a Deputy Coroner w/Donna Francart
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents I've Seen Dead People: Diary of a Deputy Coroner with guest Donna Francart

Dave & Tim open the case files of a former Deputy Coroner, Donna Francart to reveal the tragic nature of her work, her coping mechanisms and  what she learned from the living that had committed crimes and the dead who insisted their stories be heard.

For nearly nine years, Francart was a deputy coroner who worked medicolegal death investigations, which are those involving suspicious, violent, unexplained or unexpected deaths. Lacking access to structured debriefings, Francart turned to journaling as a way of privately unpacking the profound grief she faced and preserving her own mental well-being. As she did, she found herself in a conundrum of perplexing relationships with both the living and the dead. 
With her new book, I've Seen Dead People, she shares her unfiltered thoughts and emotions as she navigates a world most of us cannot imagine — a world Francart was drawn to out of a genuine desire to help others during their darkest hours. 

I've Seen Dead People also chronicles everyday moments, as Francart tried to provide as normal an upbringing as possible for her two sons. Along the way, they all learned to share their space with the many spirits that Francart encountered, and to embrace the beauty of life.

Get her book here: https://amzn.to/2Q3dMpB

Dave Schrader welcomes guests Vince Wilson and Jim Jones to discuss the haunting of the USS Constellation in Baltimore, MD. Both guests were featured in the Season 1, Episode 5 program and were deeply impacted by their experiences in different ways.

They discover the spirits of the ship's deep, dark past may still be manning their positions on a postmortem mission in a case that deeply impacted Dr. Holzer and the deep trance medium he visited with, Sybil Leek.

item.title: S16 Ep46: Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts: The Horror & Haunting of Amityville
item.itunes:title: Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts: The Horror & Haunting of Amityville
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts: The Horror & Haunting of Amityville with Special Guests 

Dave Schrader takes a deep dive into the accounts leading up to and the fall out of Amityville Horror case. This goes down as the most requested episode of The Holzer Files, tonight we discuss Dr. Holzer's involvement as well as Ed & Lorraine Warren, the deaths of the DeFeo family, the reported haunting of 112 Ocean Avenue, and the aftermath with special guests, Alexandra Holzer, Laura DiDio, Tim Yancey, Eric Walter, and Blain Duncan.  

Is Amityville the most widely played out hoax in the history of the paranormal or was there truth behind the bizarre claims?  With the help of Alexandra Holzer,

Dave discusses the psychic scarring & history and the land that Dr. Holzer exposed in his investigation. 

With truly unique access to this sordid tale, Laura DiDio was the reporter with boots on the ground at the time of the murders and subsequent haunting that followed, she was an eyewitness to the circus atmosphere of the house and the alleged haunting.  

Tim Yancey was a personal friend and confidant of George Lutz and shares behind the scene stories and insights into this story and weighs in on if he believes the accounts of paranormal activity.

Filmmaker & Documentarian, Eric Walter revealed personal stories and dug deep to uncover the unknown side of this famous haunting with his documentary, My Amityville Horror that followed the narrative of the story through the eyes of surviving family member, Daniel Lutz. 

Blaine Duncan is a paranormal investigator and researcher that has had the truly unique opportunity of having been able to visit and walk the halls of the notorious home only a few years ago. What did he find? What did the owners reveal to him? 

Tune in for a powerful and insightful discussion into one of the world's most famous and hotly debated hauntings in history, follow us to Amityville, Long Island. Fact and Fiction unearthed on the best in paranormal talk radio, this is Darkness Radio.

Listen to new episodes of Darkness Radio every week here: www.stitcher.com/show/darkness-radio

Check out the documentary here: www.MyAmityvilleHorror.com

Watch the new Amityville Horror House Shock Doc only on Discovery+

item.description:
Making Contact: Preparing for the New Realities of Extraterrestrial Existence with Alan Steinfeld

Dave and Tim are joined by Alan Steinfeld to discuss what can no longer can be denied: UFOs and their occupants are visiting our world.

Alan's new book answers questions which remain in the wake of the recent Pentagon’s disclosures as to who and why these beings are here. We will dig into what this means for the world, the people and our future.

At this critical juncture in the government’s official acknowledgement of the reality of UFOs/UAPs, scientists, politicians and mainstream news outlets have no idea what to make of these startling revelations or the outpouring of sightings and “contact” experiences currently being reported on a global scale. Today, we try to get those answers.

item.title: S16 Ep43: Darkness Radio presents PSYCHO: Ed Gein's Ghosts w/Steve Shippy & Cindy Kaza
item.itunes:title: Darkness Radio presents PSYCHO: Ed Gein's Ghosts w/Steve Shippy & Cindy Kaza
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents PSYCHO: Ed Gein's Ghosts with guests Steve Shippy & Cindy Kaza

Dave Schrader speaks with paranormal investigator Steve Shippy & Medium Cindy Kaza about their incredible investigation into one of the most horrific true crime stories and subsequent hauntings in history on their new Shock Doc, Ed Gein: The Real Psycho!

The iconic psychopaths featured in “Silence of the Lambs,” “The Texas Chainsaw Massacre” and “Psycho” were not just fictitious villains, they were inspired by a real-life personification of evil – Ed Gein, a convicted murderer and a grave robber who had a malicious obsession with human flesh. 

For the first time in history, cameras are allowed on the Gein property where the gruesome evidence was first discovered. Shippy and Kaza also meet up with local residents who provide insight on Gein and discover never-before-seen artifacts believed to be used by this malevolent monster on his helpless victims. With each investigation, the team reveals more evidence to determine what was behind his drive to kill. Making contact with the world of the dead, they capture terrifying evidence of the supernatural as they seek to answer the ultimate questions: Is Plainfield haunted by Ed Gein, his mother and his victims? Does evil live on forever?

item.title: S16 Ep35: Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - Devil in the Rock: The Haunting of Cohasset, MA
item.itunes:title: Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - Devil in the Rock: The Haunting of Cohasset, MA
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - Devil in the Rock: The Haunting of Cohasset, MA

Tonight, Dave & Tim revisit the Season 2 Finale of The #HolzerFiles with on screen stars, Alexandra Holzer & Shane Pittman and behind the scenes stars, director of photography/cinematographer Rob Toth and Supervising producer Brian Peterson.

Season 2 of the #HolzerFiles comes to an end with a bang! In 1964, legendary ghost hunter Hans Holzer ventured to the Bates Ship Chandlery in Cohasset, Massachusetts, for a preliminary investigation with witnesses of undeniable paranormal activity. Dozens of people heard phantom footsteps walking the upstairs of the old ship store, and the curator, Bob Fraser, had a chilling encounter with a full-body apparition at the top of the stairs.

After interviewing the witnesses, who all believed they were dealing with the ghost of past owner, John Bates, Holzer implored the spirit to move on and felt a follow-up with a psychic wasn't needed. However, the haunting didn't stop. It grew in intensity until the curator was driven out of town in 1982 and has since refused to return.

Now, more than half a century after Hans Holzer's cursory investigation of the Bates Ship Chandlery, the team returns to Massachusetts's rocky coast, where the paranormal activity has escalated in recent years. However, as the team delves into the chandlery's history and uncovers chilling layers of the haunting, they soon find that there's an undercurrent of darkness in the home, and it may run deeper than expected.

item.title: S16 Ep32: Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - The Hungry Ghosts of The Queen Mary
item.itunes:title: Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - The Hungry Ghosts of The Queen Mary
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - The Hungry Ghosts of The Queen Mary with guests Cindy Kaza, Shane Pittman and Erika Frost

Tonight, host Dave Schrader shares never before heard, frightening EVP from their investigation and guests Cindy Kaza, Shane Pittman and Erika Frost discuss aspects of the case that did not make it on screen and dive deep into the history and haunting of The Grey Ghost, The Queen Mary!

Legendary Ghost Hunter Hans Holzer was the first to investigation the notoriously haunted Queen Mary in Long Beach, California. When he and trance medium Sybil Leek boarded in 1976, they encountered an unsettling darkness aboard. 

Over the decades since that first pivotal investigation, thousands have visited the ship in search of the world-famous spirits aboard, and that entity that Hans and Sybil found seems to have sunk into the shadows. 

However, with the ship shut down and closed for over six months, the skeleton crew of workers has had terrifyingly aggressive encounters that bear a disturbing similarity to that which Sybil and Hans found long before this was a known paranormal mecca. 

Now, nearly half a century after Holzer's first visit, his hidden case file is finally reopened as paranormal investigator Dave Schrader, psychic medium Cindy Kaza, equipment expert Shane Pittman along with new insights from researcher Gabe Roth and Holzer's own daughter, Alexandra embark on an investigation unlike any other conducted aboard The Queen Mary, as the only living souls aboard the completely empty ship. However, as they submerse themselves in the rampant paranormal activity, they find that the well-known haunting has a dark undercurrent that just may pull them under.

Visit The Queen Mary here: www.QueenMary.com

Visit Erika Frost here: www.erikafrost.com

Visit Cindy Kaza here: www.MediumCindyKaza.com

Visit Shane Pittman here: www.OfficialShanePittman.com

Listen the the best in Paranormal Talk Radio, Darkness Radio here:www.stitcher.com/show/darkness-radio

Darkness Radio presents A Skeptic's Unexpected Proof There Is Life After Death with guest Mike Anthony

Dave & Tim share an amazing story of hope, love and proof that Life After Death exists. When Mike Anthony’s father unexpectedly died, his family was left shocked and utterly devastated. However, when a phone call came out of the blue delivering a complete stranger’s message that Mike’s dad had contacted her from “the other side,” it kicked off a chain of events that entirely changed Mike’s family’s perspective on life, death, and the transcendent nature of love. Join us on his remarkable quest, as his skeptical mindset gets challenged and eventually overruled through an extraordinary journey, leading to something that would forever change his understanding of reality.

item.title: S16 Ep29: Holzer's Ghosts - Don't Send Them to Heaven: The Haunting of The Bell House
item.itunes:title: Holzer's Ghosts - Don't Send Them to Heaven: The Haunting of The Bell House
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - Don't Send Them to Heaven: The Haunting of The Bell House with guest Aaron Sagers

Paranormal Pop Culture maverick, Aaron Sagers joins Dave Schrader of #HolzerFiles to discuss the most recent episode, Don't Send Them to Heaven the Haunting of the Bell House.

When legendary ghost hunter Hans Holzer first approached the unassuming farmhouse in Waterford, Maine, in 1968, he was in awe of the pastoral beauty of the home's dense seclusion. However, once inside, he soon found that the supernatural allure of the home may have a more malevolent source.

Within an hour's time, he grew concerned for his psychic medium's safety and withdrew her from the home, fearing the terrifying presence was attempting to possess her, as it had done to the previous homeowner before her untimely death only years before. Hans fled the from the home and pled with the homeowner to reconsider living in what Holzer believed to be a soul trap for any that reside there.

He left that day and refused to return for the rest of his long career.
Now, more than half a century after Hans Holzer first fled from the horrors of the Waterford home, his hidden case file is reopened, as paranormal investigator Dave Schrader, psychic medium Cindy Kaza, equipment expert Shane Pittman along with new insights from researcher Gabe Roth and Holzer's own daughter, Alexandra return to the unassuming Maine farmhouse to research the paranormal encounters of the current homeowner.

Together they reveal the hidden secrets of the historic home, and soon find that the spirits that Holzer believed would not leave, perhaps cannot leave, and the living may be the next targets for the possessive property's powerful presence. All this PLUS a look at next weeks episode, Dead Calm: The Haunting of The Queen Mary.

Visit Aaron's site here: www.ParanormalPopCulture.com

Watch New Episodes of Holzer Files every Saturday only on Discovery+

item.title: S16 Ep26: Holzer's Ghosts - Ancient Evil: The Haunting of America's Stonehenge
item.itunes:title: Holzer's Ghosts - Ancient Evil: The Haunting of America's Stonehenge
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - Ancient Evil: The Haunting of America's Stonehenge with guests Alexandra Holzer, Dennis Stone & Scott Wolter. 

Lead investigator of the #HolzerFiles Dave Schrader welcomes special guests, investigator and daughter of Hans Holzer, Alexandra Holzer, from America Unearthed; Scott Wolter and owner caretaker of America's Stonehenge, Dennis Stone as they review the past episode and dig deeper into the casefile. 

Throughout his storied career, legendary Ghost Hunter Hans Holzer visited Mystery Hill in Salem, New Hampshire, countless times in an attempt to uncover the origin of the hauntings that lie in the strange rock formation. He found that, for centuries, people have encountered a menacing shadow figure roaming the grounds, heard voices and cries of children, and were even physically attacked. 

However, despite Holzer's extensive research and repeated visits, he refused to discuss the haunting with his family, preferring to protect them from the seemingly dark truths buried on the site. 

Now, Holzer's hidden case file is finally reopened, and his half-century of research continues as paranormal investigator Dave Schrader, psychic medium Cindy Kaza, equipment expert Shane Pittman along with new insights from researcher Gabe Roth and Holzer's own daughter, Alexandra venture into the haunted hilltop of southern New Hampshire and face what Holzer called "an ancient evil." 

As they unearth the site's haunted past, they soon discover that they are dealing with more than restless spirits, and see for themselves why Holzer insisted on keeping his family far away from the horrors of Mystery Hill.

Watch new episodes of Holzer Files on #DiscoveryPlus and check local listings for upcoming Holzer Files marathons on #TravelChannel
item.itunes:author: Darkness Radio
item.dc:creator: Darkness Radio

item.title: S16 Ep25: Reincarnated: Edgar Cayce & The Unfulfilled Destiny of Thomas Jefferson
item.itunes:title: Reincarnated: Edgar Cayce & The Unfulfilled Destiny of Thomas Jefferson
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Reincarnated: Edgar Cayce & The Unfulfilled Destiny of Thomas Jefferson with guest Joanne DiMaggio

On June 23, 1936, Edgar Cayce, the most documented and renowned psychic of the twentieth century and the father of holistic medicine, gave a Life Reading for two-day old Thomas Jefferson (T.J.) Davis, the nephew of his secretary, Gladys Davis. In this reading, Cayce identified one of the child’s past lives as that of Thomas Jefferson, adding this stunning prediction—that he “may become more important in the affairs of the WORLD than this entity in its previous experience has been to America—Thomas Jefferson.”   

This is the story of the fate of a child that Edgar Cayce so loved and predicted could be the world’s redemption…If only. Today we take an endearing look at the relationship between Cayce and young T.J., who was tutored by Cayce for nearly the first nine years of the boy’s life in preparation for the great work ahead of him. But it also explores how decisions made by T.J.’s absentee parents put their son’s soul on a totally different path.

Get the book here: https://amzn.to/3bWO4Km

item.title: S16 Ep23: Holzer's Ghosts - The Ghost That Got Away: The Haunting of Westover Manor
item.itunes:title: Holzer's Ghosts - The Ghost That Got Away: The Haunting of Westover Manor
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - The Ghost That Got Away: The Haunting of Westover Manor

Tonight Dave Schrader is joined by a few #HolzerFiles Super Fans, Sindy Brown & Keelie Gustin to discuss the recent episode of the program and shed light on behind the scenes stories, take questions from the audience!

The Ghost That Got Away - Legendary Ghost Hunter Hans Holzer ventured to Charles County, Virginia, several times researching of one of the Old South's most infamous hauntings, Westover Manor. Delving into the property's storied history, Holzer heard countless stories of the heartbroken spirit of Evelyn Byrd, seen roaming the grounds and heard weeping in the night. However, when Holzer travelled to the Georgian mansion for a full investigation, he was refused entry. Despite never being allowed an investigation, he obsessed over the haunting, while the legends surrounding Westover only grew over the next half century.

Now, decades after Holzer's visit, his hidden case file is finally reopened as paranormal investigator Dave Schrader, psychic medium Cindy Kaza, equipment expert Shane Pittman along with new insights from researcher Gabe Roth and Holzer's own daughter, Alexandra delve into the haunting that got away. However, as the locked gates of Westover are opened for a paranormal investigation for the first time, the team soon finds that the longing spirit of Evelyn Byrd has an unsettling story of her own to tell, and that she may not be the only presence lurking in these hallowed halls.

Watch new episodes oh Holzer Files every Saturday on Discovery+

item.title: S16 Ep20: Holzer's Ghosts: Ghosts of Port Clyde
item.itunes:title: Holzer's Ghosts: Ghosts of Port Clyde
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts: Ghosts of Port Clyde with guests Shane Pittman & Jamie Kaler

Tonight Dave Schrader, lead investigator of the Holzer Files is joined by fellow investigator Shane Pittman and paranormal adventurer and actor/comedian Jamie Kaler to discuss the most recent episode of The #HolzerFiles.

In 1976, legendary ghost hunter Hans Holzer visited the quiet coastal Maine town of Port Clyde to investigate the haunting of a woman's home. Her horrific dreams bled into a terrifying reality as members of her family started experiencing a dark figure appearing in the home, whispering in the night, and even physically attacking them in their beds.

Now, nearly half a century after Hans Holzer first helped cross over a restless spirit, his hidden case file is reopened, as paranormal investigator Dave Schrader, psychic medium Cindy Kaza, equipment expert Shane Pittman along with new insights from researcher Gabe Roth and Holzer's own daughter, Alexandra return to Maine's rocky coast to research the resurgent haunting.

However, as they delve into the family's haunting, they soon find that the haunting is very different from that which Hans Holzer encountered, and the spirits in the home may have a more personal attachment than they ever suspected a team member is left scarred for life!

Check out Jamie's YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/JamieKaler

Visit Shane's site: www.officialshanepittman.com

item.title: S16 Ep17: Holzer's Ghosts - The Ghosts of Howard Lodge w/ Chris Emery
item.itunes:title: Holzer's Ghosts - The Ghosts of Howard Lodge w/ Chris Emery
item.description:
This week the Holzer Files team uncovers the haunting reality of a stately Maryland manor that seems to draw specific families and forges frightening bonds with the children, a bond that connects them to the house, forever!

Dave is joined by guest Chris Emery who grew up in this fascinating and frightening home to discuss the case, his experiences and the eerie connection that haunts his dreams and his future desires.

Chris has led a remarkable life, one that led him from his infamous haunted home to one of the most haunted houses in the world, The White House! Chris Emery was only the 18th White House Usher since 1891, and had the honor and privilege to serve presidential families for three years during the Reagan administration, four years for President H. W. Bush, and 14 months under President Clinton. Was the White House haunted? Tune in to find out.

All this plus a sneak peek at next weeks all New Holzer Files, The Ties that Burn - The Ghosts of Port Clyde only on Discovery+

item.title: S16 Ep16: Haunted Florida Ghostly Love Stories w/Chris Balzano
item.itunes:title: Haunted Florida Ghostly Love Stories w/Chris Balzano
item.description:
Darkness Radio celebrates the upcoming Valentine's Day with Haunted Florida Ghostly Love Stories with guest Chris Balzano

Wide eyes, sweaty palms and a racing heart. Are these the tell-tale marks of a love story or a haunted tale? If the story is set in Florida, there's a good chance it's both. From the infamous Bellamy Bridge to a haunted lighthouse in Key West, love is in the air--but it isn't always a good thing. Author and folklorist Christopher Balzano follows lingering campus whispers and trails that vanish into the swamp to track down the urban legends and ghostly lore of Sunshine State love affairs that live on even after death.

Get the book here: https://amzn.to/3snKTTF

Visit his site here: Tripping on Legends… – Standing at the Crossroads…

item.title: S16 Ep14: The Life, Near Death, & Miracles of Charlie Gardner
item.itunes:title: The Life, Near Death, & Miracles of Charlie Gardner
item.description:
Darkness Radio explores The Life, Near Death & Miracles of Charlie Gardner
 

Today Dave and Tim uncover A Near-Death Experience You Won’t Forget!

Sure, near-death experiences are fairly common, but Charles (Charlie) Gardner’s experience may take the cake when it comes to pathos, humor, and life lessons. Nine years ago, when he developed sepsis while recovering from the flu, Charlie spent six weeks in a coma, suffered 13 strokes and major organ failure.

In the near-death experience that accompanied that ordeal, Charlie had the requisite out-of-body experience but the bright light he saw was something altogether different!  This is a look at his life leading up to the incident, during the experience and the aftermath of this enigma.

Get the book here: https://bit.ly/2YbZLpZ

Visit his site here: www.CharlesGardnerAuthor.com

The Holzer Files Team is disturbed at how closely the case mirrors a modern day case. A single mother and her two sons, under attack by an unseen force. The team realizes they may be in over their heads and they call out the big guns, Rev. Bill Bean. Dave and Bill discuss the two cases featured in Season 1, Episode 4, The Devil in Texas and try to separate Hollywood fiction from horrific reality of demonic influence and possession and what we can do to protect ourselves.

item.title: S16 Ep10: Where Madness Lies w/ Sylvia True
item.itunes:title: Where Madness Lies w/ Sylvia True
item.description:
Darkness Radio observes World Holocaust Awareness Day with a look into Where Madness Lies with guest Sylvia True

Dave & Tim are transported back and forth to Nazi Germany and the present to discuss the thread that Sylvia True and her family have woven through history.  This is an interesting discussion about mental health, human atrocities and ties to the paranormal.  

This is a story about hope and redemption, about what we pass on, both genetically and culturally. It is about the high price of repression, and how one woman, who lost nearly everything, must be willing to reveal the failures of the past in order to save future generations.

Visit our guest here: www.SylviaTrue.com

Get her book here: https://amzn.to/3qAFIxP

The team heads to San Diego to visit the Whaley House Museum, a location Dr. Hans Holzer deemed as the most haunted home in America. Their harrowing investigation reveals a dark presence may still be influencing the living in an attempt to fulfill a centuries-old vendetta.

Dave & Alexandra discuss the original case and investigations that led to the Holzer Files team revisiting this extraordinary location.

Darkness Radio realizes, I'd Rather Talk to Dead People with guest Kitsie Duncan

Paranormal Researcher Kitsie Duncan lived most of her life terrified of the existence of the paranormal. After losing her father she wanted to know more about life after death. This hunger for knowledge led her to the world of ghost hunting and paranormal research. Quickly she found herself obsessed with proving that the spirit world isn’t as scary as many think. For over twelve years, she and her crew at the Oddity Files have investigated some of the most infamous haunted locations in the world and come away with evidence that will prove to you, that not only are these locations haunted, but these spirits have a story to tell us.

item.description:
Darkness Radio Presents Holzer's Ghosts: They Buried Me Alive - The Haunting of The Morris-Jumel Mansion

Dave Schrader is joined by special guests Vinny Carbone and Christopher Davalos. Both were featured in the episode of The Holzer Files and have long haunted histories with The Morris-Jumel Mansion.

The team resurrects legendary ghost hunter Hans Holzer's case file of the haunted Morris-Jumel Mansion in New York City to investigate a dark, mysterious presence residing within the historic home.

This is one of Dave's favorite episodes of Season 1 for its rich history and the historic sighting of a ghost seen by a group of school children and their teachers, a story that exploded in the papers and drew the attention of Dr. Hans Holzer.

Dave & Tim welcome producer Yoichi Utebi to the program to discuss his thought provoking film about the supernatural. item.title: S15 Ep112: A Ghost Adventure to Horror Hotel w/ Jay Wasley
item.itunes:title: A Ghost Adventure to Horror Hotel w/ Jay Wasley
item.description:
Darkness Radio goes on a Ghost Adventure to Horror Hotel with guest Jay Wasley

Jay Wasley has been an important aspect of the Travel Channel's hit series, Ghost Adventures, both behind and in front of the camera and has become a beloved member of the team. This is his first appearance on Darkness Radio. Today we discuss his work, experiences and the creepy new special Ghost Adventures: Cecil Hotel.

Stationed along downtown Los Angeles’ Main Street stands an infamous hotel with a checkered past beset by multiple suicides, murders, devil worshipping and serial killers. Perhaps it is most known for the recent mysterious death of a young girl named Elisa Lam, whose body was found in the hotel’s water tower without any explanation as to what may have happened. Her peculiar demise remains unsolved, and bizarre elevator surveillance video of Lam has fueled an abundance of theories, including that of supernatural forces. Now, for the first time ever, the Cecil Hotel is allowing cameras inside for an investigation of ghostly proportions in the two-hour special, GHOST ADVENTURES: CECIL HOTEL, launching on Discovery, Inc.’s new discovery+ streaming service beginning Monday, January 4, 2021.

For more information on discovery+, please visit discoveryplus.com

item.title: S15 Ep111: A Demon-Haunted Land: Witches, Wonder Doctors, & the Ghosts of the Past in Post WWII Germany
item.itunes:title: A Demon-Haunted Land: Witches, Wonder Doctors, & the Ghosts of the Past in Post WWII Germany
item.description:
Darkness Radio enters A Demon-Haunted Land: Witches, Wonder Doctors, and the Ghosts of the Past in Post WWII Germany with guest Monica Black

Today the boys take a look at a revelatory counter-history of postwar Germany, not as a reborn democracy but as a nation convulsed by apocalyptic visions, witchcraft trials, and supernatural obsessions.

In the aftermath of World War II, a succession of mass supernatural events swept through a war-torn Germany. As millions were afflicted by a host of seemingly incurable maladies (including blindness and paralysis), waves of apocalyptic rumors crashed over the land. A messianic faith healer rose to extraordinary fame, prayer groups performed exorcisms, and enormous crowds traveled to witness apparitions of the Virgin Mary. Most strikingly, scores of people accused their neighbors of witchcraft and found themselves in turn hauled into court on charges of defamation, assault, and even murder. What linked these events, in the wake of an annihilationist war and the Holocaust, was a widespread preoccupation with evil.

Get the book here: https://amzn.to/2JJz3B8

Get all kinds of cool paranormal swag here: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave

item.title: S15 Ep109: Strange Skies: UFOs w/Ryan Sprague
item.itunes:title: Strange Skies: UFOs w/Ryan Sprague
item.description:
Darkness Radio turns our gaze to Strange Skies: UFOs with guest Ryan Sprague.

Ryan Sprague revisits the show to introduces brand new stories of those who have seen extraordinary things in our skies and how these incredible events have changed them. While reports of UFOs and close encounters are littered with dates, times, and descriptions, they rarely focus on the people who’ve had the experience. Could both the positive and negative implications, whether subtle or revelatory, further our knowledge of what these phenomena represent? 

Ryan is host of Somewhere in the Skies podcast every Monday, and co-host the television series, 'Mysteries Decoded' on the CW Network for their UFO episodes.

item.title: S15 Ep107: Seduced: Inside the NXVIM Cult w/ India Oxenberg
item.itunes:title: Seduced: Inside the NXVIM Cult w/ India Oxenberg
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents True Crime Tuesday is Seduced: Inside the NXVIM Cult with guest India Oxenberg.

We are joined by India Oxenberg for a look into her deeply personal docuseries, Seduced on STARZ.
NXVIM was from all appearances the answer so many sought to making a better life, to others, it quickly dissolved into a nightmare. 

There was two things this cult didn't count on, Catherine Oxenberg and the love and determination of a mother to see her daughter through to safety under any circumstances and a Phoenix named India who rose from the ashes to put right what once was wrong. 

This is India's story.

To get more info on the docuseries visit here:  Home - Seduced: Inside the NXIVM cult (seduceddocumentary.com)

Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - Blood in the Water: Haunting of The Conference House with guest Tyrese Gould Jacinto.

Hans believed a grisly murder haunted Staten Island’s Conference House, where in 1776 a last-minute meeting failed to stop the American Revolution. But when the team returns, they’re led to the water’s edge where a terrible truth awaits.

History DEMANDS to be heard tonight on a NEW episode of The Holzer Files and Dave is joined on this presentation of Holzer's Ghosts by guest, Tyrese Gould Jacinto a member of the Lenni Lenape Tribe to unpack this file and uncover the haunting truth of this area and the horrific deaths that took place there.

item.title: S15 Ep103: The Hauntings and History of the Emerald Isle
item.itunes:title: The Hauntings and History of the Emerald Isle
item.description:
Darkness Radio goes on a journey to the dark side of the Hauntings and History of the Emerald Isle with guest June Gossler Anderson.

Every year Darkness Radio Dave Schrader goes on fascinating travels to far away places to investigate the history and hauntings of ancient countries, one of his favorite places in the world is Ireland. June Gossler Anderson joined Dave on many of these trips and has begun documenting the stories, the fables and the experiences that are uncovered on these quests. Today we look into the ghost stories and experiences in Ireland and other experiences with the other side that June and Dave shared.

Ireland is famous for its “thin places,” a membrane or a thin layer between worlds that cross over each other. From pagan times to the present, Ireland’s dark history has been recorded in its abbeys and churches, forts and castles, jails, and graveyards by those who lived during those turbulent times and often perished because of them. Their ghosts are eyewitnesses to this history and sometimes they are the history. 

Get the book here:  https://amzn.to/3dj009A  


See the video here from Ireland discussing The Banshee:   https://bit.ly/3iWpZVn

The Holzer Files reopens Dr. Hans Holzer's First Paranormal Case in Rockland County, NY. An area so haunted that Hans returned time after time to investigate, but 1 request came too late in his remarkable career for him to go personally investigate, the restless ghosts of The Suffern House.

Dave, Cindy and Shane return to Rockland County to complete the investigation Dr. Holzer could not. With the aide of Alexandra Holzer and researcher Gabe Roth the team uncovers some strange history that may finally shine some light on the darkness of the supernatural phenomena in that area.

Alexandra Holzer & Shane Pittman join Dave Schrader to discuss this case, the strange findings and give some insights to this episode that did not make it to air.

item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - The Final Word Edition

Tonight Dave is joined by 3 special guests, Alexandra Holzer, Karen A. Dahlman & Shane Pittman, to discuss tonight's episode of The Holzer Files, Final Word, which involved the haunting of Franklin Castle in Cleveland, OH.

A powerful episode with stunning supernatural evidence. The team visits the site of one of Dr. Holzer's most challenging cases, where equipment failed him on every visit and his access eventually was denied.We discuss some of the radical experiments used in tonight's episode to make communication with the spirits still time locked within its walls from a controversial OUIJA board session, Spirit Art and deep immersion into darkness experiments to incorporating Dave's 13 yr old daughter into the investigation to help bridge the chasm to the ghost of a young girl still wandering the halls of Franklin Castle.

In light of the touching story and premature death of Emma featured in tonight's episode and the personal impact of Type 1 Diabetes in the lives of Dave and Alexandra's children, Please consider donating to the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation to help put an end to Type 1 Diabetes. www.JDRF.org

Visit Alexandra's site: www.AlexandraHolzer.com

Visit the Talking Board Historical Society: www.TBHS.org

item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Holzer's Ghosts - Death to Tyrants Edition with guest Coby Treadway

Darkness Radio takes a look at Season 2, Episode 3 of The Holzer Files and discusses the misunderstood history of the Lincoln Assassination and its ties to The Surratt Tavern in Maryland, the infamous first stop of John Wilkes Booth after assassinating Abraham Lincoln in 1865. 

Coby Treadway joins Dave as the special guest tonight as they spend the first half of the show discussing a fascinating part of history, peeling back the layers of misrepresentation and bringing forth the truth. Later in the episode they discuss

Coby's many haunting experiences, they take questions and comments from the audience and Dave teases the very powerful next episode, Final Word - The Haunting of Franklin Castle!

Dave is joined by his Holzer Files castmate, Cindy Kaza to discuss the new episode of The Holzer Files, Tell Me No Lies. The team visits The Merchant's House in NY a site that intrigued Dr. Holzer when he visited as he knew there was something off about the tale he was being told. Dave, Cindy & Shane return to uncover that mystery and give voice to the forgotten spirits of manor. 

Dave & Cindy also answer questions from the audience.  These special episodes will air after each episode of The Holzer Files on Travel Channel. Stay Spooky!

Next week Death to Tyrants as the team comes face to face with the spirits of The Surrat Tavern, the notorious location John Wilkes Booth visited after assassinating President Lincoln. item.description:
Darkness Radio crawls out of their tomb to investigate Supernatural News & ParaShare God of Chaos Edition!

Dave & Tim are here to brighten your week with more absurd and supernatural tales from around the world.
Dave's plans for his 101st birthday just got squashed with news that Apophis the Killer Asteroid may collidewith Earth in 2068. Troublesome toys are scaring up a second life. item.title: S15 Ep89: Halloween with the Harvest: An Alien Abduction
item.itunes:title: Halloween with the Harvest: An Alien Abduction
item.description:
Darkness Radio celebrates Halloween with the Harvest: An Alien Abduction with guest G.L. Davies

Dave & Tim welcome back Gavin Davies to discuss his most terrifying investigation yet. In 2009 one woman from Pembrokeshire believed she was abducted by aliens. What followed was a terrifying ordeal of alien visitation, nightmarish visions, encounters with terrifying creatures, a connection to the past, and a prophecy of destruction on the scale never before seen in Pembrokeshire's peaceful history. 
While the world waits for "proof" of alien life, it seems the harsh reality is that, the harvest has begun.

item.description:
Darkness Radio digs in to Holzer's Ghosts with guests Cindy Kaza, Shane Pittman & Dave Schrader.

Tim helps lead a discussion about the return of the popular ghost show, The Holzer Files Season 2 on Travel Channel with Dave , Cindy and Shane. A season interrupted by a pandemic, heightened fears across the world, and the team talks about how it affected the haunted locations and the fact that attention starved spirits demanded to be heard  during investigations of paranormal hot spots. All this plus a few cool EVPs that Dave captured during filming of the series that will not appear on the TV show.

Holzer Files is brand new TONIGHT, Oct 29, 2020 on on Travel Channel.

For more information visit here: https://www.travelchannel.com/shows/holzer-files

item.title: S15 Ep86: Death Walker with Nick Groff
item.itunes:title: Death Walker with Nick Groff
item.description:
Darkness Radio becomes a Death Walker with guest Nick Groff

This Halloween, the all-new highly anticipated series, Death Walker, drops exclusively on VIDI SPACE hosted by world renowned paranormal researcher, Nick Groff (of Paranormal Lockdown, Ghost Adventures and Ghosts of Shepherdstown). The show focuses on Nick’s solo journey into understanding different reasons why various locations are haunted. In its unique format, two locations are compared each episode highlighting different paranormal theories where he delves into the concept of time, the impact of crime events, realizing not everything is a ghost and expanding the definition of paranormal phenomena. 

Today Dave & Tim visit with their old friend to discuss his new project and his passion for the paranormal and how it has affected his life, in good and bad ways.

Check out the new series HERE:  https://experience.vidi.space/products/death-walker   

Investigate with Nick here: http://www.nickgrofftour.com/

item.title: S15 Ep84: The Phenomenon w/James Fox
item.itunes:title: The Phenomenon w/James Fox
item.description:
<p>Darkness Radio peers into The Phenomenon with guest James Fox.</p>

<p>Today, Dave and Tim discuss director James Fox’s explosive new documentary that is being hailed as the most credible examination of the longstanding cover-up and global mystery involving unidentified aerial phenomenon. Including shocking testimony from high-ranking government and military officials, NASA Astronauts, other credible sources, and riveting never-before seen footage, the timely film also reveals the monumental events behind the NY Times’ recent bombshell disclosure of The Pentagon’s secret UFO Program, and provides eye-opening evidence that mankind is not alone in the universe.</p>
 
To watch the documentary go here: <a href="url">https://thephenomenonfilm.com/</a> <p>

Get great paranormal books and gifts here: <a href="url">https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave</a> <p>

item.itunes:title: Dallas Demons, Fort Worth Goatmen & Other Terrors of the Trinity River
item.description:

Listen Free Here--> https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/darkness-radio-podcast

Listen Ad Free Here-->
www.stitcherpremium.com/darkness
USE CODE: DARKNESSRADIO for deep discount subscriptions

In the metropolitan mosaic that joins Dallas and Fort Worth together into a brightly lit metroplex, some mysterious figures still manage to keep to the shadows and slip through the cracks. Even after the Lake Worth Monster inspired a rash of phone calls to the Fort Worth Police Department, the "Goatman of Greer Island" faded back into the haze of myth. Is Lake Granbury's Ol' One Eye an impossibly large catfish or a sidetracked sea serpent? Could pterosaurs really coexist with the region's congested skies? From the Lady of White Rock Lake to the Creature of Copper Canyon and the Chupacabras of Cedar Hill, Jason McLean shares strange stories of these encounters with us.

Get the book here: https://amazon.com

Visit his site here: http://www.sirupapers.com/

Ghosts are spirits of the dead who failed to transition to the afterlife for one reason or another. Some merely ghost indefinitely. Others however, achieve the ability to haunt, disrupt, influence, Attach to, and even possess living human beings. The experiences of those afflicted are often discredited and they themselves dismissed. However, there are explanations for these occurrences. There is help and we have the answer with Robert Major & Antoinette.

Today, they share some of their chilling experiences and how they can help you or others you know with attachments.
For Help reach out to them at: www.GhostRemover.com

item.itunes:title: Edison vs Tesla: Communicating with the Dead
item.description:
Darkness Radio presents Edison vs Tesla Communicating with the Dead with guest Bill Birnes.

Thomas Edison closely following the alternative physics work of Albert Einstein and Max Planck, convincing him that there was an entire reality unseen by the human eye. This led to the last and least-known of all Edison’s inventions, the spirit phone. His former associate, now bitter rival, Nikola Tesla, was also developing at the same time a similar mysterious device. Edison vs. Tesla examines their quest to talk to the dead, other planets and more!

item.title: S15 Ep39: The Human Hybridization Program with Geraldine Orozco
item.itunes:title: The Human Hybridization Program with Geraldine Orozco
item.description:
Darkness Radio contemplates the Human Hybridization Program with guest Geraldine Orozco

Today Dave & Tim sit down to dig into the Human Hybridization Program.
Abductions. Reproduction experiments. Memories of seeing children off-planet. The idea of humans participating in an alien hybrid program sounds absurd until you talk to people who have experienced it. On October 14, 2013 Geraldine experienced a vivid abduction from her home, this is her story!

There are many aspects to the Hybridization Program, some experiencers may encounter higher vibrational experiences, while others can experience trauma. Terrestrial experiences such as in Military Abductions (MilAb) are often lead by factions of the Government, with or without ET involvement. Other programs include Extraterrestrial/inter-dimensional experiences conducted in a controlled environment by means of technology such as aboard craft or interdimensionally. Our guest, Geraldine Orozco believes all cases are just as valid and require support, understanding, and compassion.

Visit her site here: https://www.hybridmother.com/

Mitchell Nicholas Gerber is a veteran activist, who has dedicated his life for the last 19 years to exposing Forced Organ Harvesting. With a resilient character and a determined mind, he has been working hard on the frontline of a significant cause; which has been coined a “New form of evil.” Risking his life 100 miles from the Chinese border, in Hanoi Vietnam, in a crucial attempt to raise awareness about The Forced Organ Harvesting of The Prisoners of Conscience.

Mitchell’s intention is to get the word out about The Forced Organ Harvesting, across as many media outlets and channels as possible, and he calls to action kind hearted human beings who will welcome an interesting discussion about this continuing crime and pressing topic.

For more information on Falun Gong: www.falundafa.org & https://faluninfo.net/

& www.EndTransplantAbuse.org

item.title: S15 Ep29: Ethel Allen's Date with the Devil and Supernatural News
item.itunes:title: Ethel Allen's Date with the Devil and Supernatural News
item.description:
Darkness Radio is an eyewitness to Ethel Allen's Date with the Devil with guest Gail Sheldon PLUS Supernatural News

Dave Schrader speaks with his guest Gail Sheldon about the brutal murder of Ethel Allen, whose mutilated and burned body was found on the bank of the Indian River on November 21, 1934. This murder has continued to fascinate in part due to the violence involved in the crime and partly because no one was ever arrested for it. That such a sensational crime occurred at all in sleepy Brevard County at that early of a date also adds to the shock factor. However, some 78 years later local authors Gail Sheldon and Gloria Falco set out to try and solve this very cold case and have put together their findings using unconventional paranormal research and investigative methods to shed some light on this long dead case. PLUS TIM HAS A FEW SUPERNATURAL NEWS STORIES!

See the Skinwalker video here: https://bit.ly/2XhHngo
There is a weird moment at 3 hour 7 min and 20 second mark

See the Alien/Venom video: https://bit.ly/2JPegsE

item.itunes:title: A Song of Dance and Death: Magic, Murder, Mayhem
item.description:
Darkness Radio tunes in A Song of Dance and Death: Magic, Murder, Mayhem and the Diabolical Notes of the Devil's Music with guest Troy Taylor.

Author Troy Taylor offers up a strange array of frightening tales from the annals of American music, from the tragic deaths of rock icons to curses, murders, and brushes with the supernatural. Today he guides us into the way that the occult, magic, and the paranormal have shaped the history of rock-n-roll and the part that they've all played in its popularity. We will uncover some of rock-n-roll's most horrific murders, and infamous and little-known twists of fate, like the Buddy Holly Curse, the Curse of the Grand Ole Opry, the 27 Club and others.

Visit his site here: https://www.americanhauntingsink.com/

Get the book here: https://amazon.com

item.title: S15 Ep16: Abduction: The Bigfoot Alien Encounter
item.itunes:title: Abduction: The Bigfoot Alien Encounter
item.description:
Darkness Radio uncovers an Abduction: The Bigfoot Alien Encounter with guest Patti Houtz!

Patti Houtz recounts an incredible experience from her upcoming memoir, “Solo By Choice.”

Ms. Houtz has led a most extraordinary life that only got more unusual when she and her boyfriend were employed in the 1970s by an archaeological society to be part of an expedition that went in search
of Bigfoot in Big Cypress Swamp in the Everglades. Accompanied by two fisherman, eyewitnesses, a photographer from National Geographic and open minds they become witness to a scenario that defies logic.

Was it Bigfoot, Aliens or something even more remarkable? In Patti’s opinion, it is a life-changing moment, and she is only now willing to share the experience with us.

item.title: S15 Ep3: SPECIAL BONUS EPISODE: Playing Dead
item.itunes:title: SPECIAL BONUS EPISODE: Playing Dead
item.description:
True Crime Tuesday is PLAYING DEAD with our guest and survivor, Monique Faison Ross !

Monique, the daughter of San Diego Chargers' football great Earl Faison, married her high school sweetheart, soon after she discovered she was pregnant with his child. Her relationship with Chris was shaky from the start, but turned tumultuous as he became verbally and physically abusive. When she could no longer put up with the abuse, she left him with their children. That was when the stalking and genuine threats began. Nothing stopped him—not protection injunctions, police warnings, or even arrests. This is a story of true terror!

GET HELP WITHOUT SAYING A WORD HERE: https://www.thehotline.org/
1-800-799-7233

Get her book here: https://amazon.com

ALL OUT MONSTER ATTACK on BEYOND the DARKNESS with Alien Legacy & guest Geraldine Sutton Stith!

August 21, 1955 was just another hot summer night like so many others in the small community of Kelly, Kentucky. Lucky Sutton along with his family and friends were enjoying a quiet peaceful evening. The family not knowing that all around them strange things were happening.

Lucky and his family were about to find out what lurks in the darkness. The visitors were not from this earth. A night that started like any other ended with gunshots and screams and 11 people who's live would be forever changed.

item.title: S14 Ep95: Past Lives: Journeys Revealed
item.itunes:title: Past Lives: Journeys Revealed
item.description:
Today BEYOND the DARKNESS goes back in time to investigate Past Lives: Journeys Revealed with clinical hypnotherapist Damian Bertrand.

You saw him on The Holzer Files on Travel Channel, now listen as clinical hypnotherapist Damian Bertrand, C.Ht, shares his findings, he never expected to help others by transporting them decades, or even hundreds of years, into the past to discover the true meaning behind broken relationships, strange phobias, and unexplained behavior.

Confident that reincarnation was nothing but an unsolved puzzle of the subconscious mind, Bertrand performed hypnotic regressions on willing clients, shocked to find that their stories were rich in details that corroborated with research into very real past lives: Existences that span from heartbreaking tales of lost love, to the victories of tribal leaders protecting their ancient villages.

Past life regression quickly became the basis for Bertrand's private practice in Los Angeles, CA, and then the subject of his television show REINCARNATION: PAST LIVES.

Visit his site here: http://damianbertrand.com/

BEYOND the DARKNESS is playing with Eerie Companions as we examine A History of Haunted Dolls with David Weatherly.

Dolls. The very word conjures a range of thoughts and emotions, from comfort and happiness to terror. Most often, dolls are thought of as companions for little girls, but why are they considered prime targets for dark forces? And why are so many of them believed to be haunted? As part of human culture for thousands of years, dolls have been used in magic, ritual, healing…even attempted murder. Today we step inside a mystery and discover the fascinating history of haunted dolls.

item.title: S13 Ep137: Bob Lazar: Area 51 & Flying Saucers
item.itunes:title: Bob Lazar: Area 51 & Flying Saucers
item.description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS has Bob Lazar: Area 51 & Flying Saucers with documentarian Jeremy Corbell!

Former Government physicist Bob Lazar made headlines world-wide in 1989 when he came forward with his account of reverse-engineering an alien spacecraft for the US Military. The reason the public even knows the name Area 51 is because Lazar talked about the work he did at the formerly secret military base. Burdened with a revolutionary secret, he had to choose between his oath to his country or his conscience. His testimony remains the most controversial and important UFO story of all time.

To see the documentary or purchase visit www.ExtraordinaryBeliefs.com

item.itunes:title: The Inheritance: Poisoned Fruit of JFK's Assassination
item.description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS takes a final look at the Kennedy Assasination on it's 55th Anniversary as we investigate
The Inheritance: Poisoned Fruit of JFK's Assassination with Christopher Fulton.
LISTEN ANYTIME HERE-->


Christopher Fulton's journey began with the death of Evelyn Lincoln, late secretary to President John F. Kennedy. Through Lincoln, crucial evidence ended up in Christopher's hands.

Fulton had possession of the closest physical evidence to President Kennedy’s fatal head wounds and was the first person since Robert F. Kennedy to listen to JFK’s secret Oval Office recordings.

item.title: S13 Ep117: The Horrific Haunting of the Yates Family
item.itunes:title: The Horrific Haunting of the Yates Family
item.description:
Jay Yates was haunted as a young child, followed by things he couldn't see or explain. In 1999, Jay had a near death experience that would change the direction of his life. Marie was a skeptic (and psychic) who had an autistic child who talked to imaginary playmates, but these playmates had bad intentions. Jay came along and bonded with Marie's son, and Jay and Marie fell in love, blended their family and unfortunately, combined some of their nightmares! Jay and Marie Yates join BEYOND the DARKNESS to talk about their paranormal journey to this point and discuss why sometimes it is better to go through this thing together with the ones you love! 

PLUS: A brand new Theater of the Mind!!

item.description:
Precognition is the scientific name for the knowledge or perception of the future, obtained through extrasensory means. We think we have it and can wield it, but what if science can actually prove it? Author Theresa Cheung joins BEYOND the DARKNESS to talk about how she teamed up with cognitive neuroscientist Julia Mossbridge, PhD, to not only show that sensing the future is possible, but provable through testing that YOU can participate in!!

item.title: S13 Ep99: The Supernatural in Society, Culture, and History with Professor Marc Eaton
item.itunes:title: The Supernatural in Society, Culture, and History with Professor Marc Eaton
item.description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS looks into The Supernatural in Society, Culture, and History with Professor Marc Eaton.

In the twenty-first century, as in centuries past, stories of the supernatural thrill and terrify us. But despite their popularity, scholars often dismiss such beliefs in the uncanny as inconsequential, or even embarrassing.
The supernatural is an indelible part of our social world that deserves sincere scholarly attention.
Professor Eaton explores the cultural value of such beliefs and practices.

Marc Eaton is an Associate Professor of Sociology at Ripon College, in Wisconsin.

Get the book here: tupress.temple.edu/book/20000000009554

PLUS: A brand new Theater of the Mind!!

item.title: S13 Ep73: Golden State Killer: It's Not Over (Or Is It?)
item.itunes:title: Golden State Killer: It's Not Over (Or Is It?)
item.description:
True Crime Tuesday digs into the case of The Golden State Killer: It's Not Over with TrueCrimeGuy.com Mike Morford!
At the time this originally aired on True Crime Tuesday, He could have still been out there, somewhere. The notorious Golden State Killer, also known as the East Area Rapist and Original Night Stalker is believed to have murdered 12 people, committed 45 sexual assaults, and robbed 120 residences in the span of 10 years.
He was one of the most feared name in the Pacific Northwest from 1976 to 1986 — and police, detectives, and the FBI had yet to catch the notorious killer. In fact, despite having a DNA profile that links his crimes, he was still at large.
But, Police believe they now have the killer in custody! Listen to this recap of the profile of the Golden State Killer with Mike Morford, then head over to Patreon and subscribe to True Crime Tuesday to get the update on him from Mike!

Plus on this episode: Dumb Crimes and Stupid Criminals!

Want more great true crime episodes like this? Get them now at https://www.patreon.com/truecrimetuesday

item.description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS goes in search of The Lost Samoan Pyramid with our guide, Maya Lynch. A forgotten pyramid. An ancient curse. A real-life archaeological adventure.

Since the 1800s rumours have circulated about an ancient pyramid, built on an immense scale, hidden deep in the jungles of Samoa. Evidence perhaps of a great forgotten Pacific Empire. And yet there is no mention of the pyramid in the entire pantheon of Samoan myth. Samoan society is steeped in tradition but the local legends are silent on the subject of the pyramid. When one woman digging into the archives discovers an outlier in the dataset of Pacific history, it is the catalyst for an adventure that takes us on a treasure hunt deep into the jungles of Samoa.

item.description:
Millions of people have seen UFOs and many even recall personal encounters with strange entities. The popular view is that these are advanced aliens visiting us from far away, but a compelling new documentary takes a deeper look at the events, the beliefs, the experts and the people who have shaped our views in the otherworldly.

This documentary seeks to solve one of the most haunting and persistent mysteries of our time by addressing UFO sightings in every country, things seen on radar, what happened at Roswell, alien abductions, government cover-ups, and even a new religion. The truth will surprise you!

item.title: S12 Ep196: UFO Encounter in the Desert
item.itunes:title: UFO Encounter in the Desert
item.description:
The UFO landing at Socorro has been wrapped in controversy almost from the moment that police officer Lonnie Zamora watched a craft descend and land. Zamora saw alien beings near the craft and a symbol on its side but was told that he shouldnt mention either. Encounter in the Desert revealsfor the first timeexactly what he saw in that arroyo in 1964 and what an examination of the landing revealed to investigators.

Kevin D. Randle is a retired Army lieutenant colonel who served as a helicopter pilot in Vietnam and an intelligence officer in Iraq. He studied anthropology and journalism at the University of Iowa and holds advanced degrees from the American Military University and California Coast University. He has been studying UFOs for 50 years and has published dozens of books about the subject.

item.title: S12 Ep193: On the Trail of New Orleans Vampires
item.itunes:title: On the Trail of New Orleans Vampires
item.description:
New Orleans has a reputation as a home for creatures of the night.

In the early days of Louisianas colonization, rumors swirled about the fate of the Casket Girls, a group of mysterious maidens traveling to the New World from France with peculiar casket-shaped boxes. A charismatic man who moved to the French Quarter in the early 1900s eerily resembled a European aristocrat of one hundred years prior bearing the same name. A pair of brothers terrorized the town with their desire to feed on living human blood during the Great Depression. Marita Woywod Crandle investigates the origins of these legends with us, legends that are so intricately woven through New Orleanss rich history.

item.title: S12 Ep177: The Quest To Prove That Ghosts Are Real
item.itunes:title: The Quest To Prove That Ghosts Are Real
item.description:
You've just laid down for the night when suddenly doors slam and the curtains shift. The lights begin to flicker and a white mist forms in front of you. You shut your eyes and keep muttering, ghosts aren't real. But then you open your eyes and realize that harmless mist has shifted into the form of a man, staring intensely at you, as he floats above your bed.

What causes ghostly experiences?

Are ghosts real?

Why do certain people report numerous ghostly encounters and others none?

Our guest Brandon Massullo is a clinical therapist and parapsychologist and today he joins us to explore these questions and more!

https://www.facebook.com/brandon.massullo

item.title: S12 Ep158: Erik Jan Hanussen: Hitler's Jewish Clairvoyant
item.itunes:title: Erik Jan Hanussen: Hitler's Jewish Clairvoyant
item.description:
Erik Jan Hanussen was a psychic, hypnotist, astrologer, amateur detective and publisher of tabloids and born Herschmann-Chaim Steinschneider in 1889 in a Viennese jail cell and murdered in Berlin in 1933 on the orders of SA officers who owed him money. His remarkable life is the subject of Berkeley professor Mel Gordon's Erik Jan Hanussen: Hitler's Jewish Clairvoyant. Mel joins us in this episode to tell us why a Jewish entertainer with psychic gifts would choose to align himself with a regime that would ultimately lead to his death...

Mel Gordon: https://www.amazon.com/Erik-Jan-Hanussen-Hitlers-Clairvoyant/dp/0922915687

item.title: S12 Ep157: Secret Agent 666: Aleister Crowley, British Intelligence and the Occult
item.itunes:title: Secret Agent 666: Aleister Crowley, British Intelligence and the Occult
item.description:
Aleister Crowley, also known as the Great Beast, has been the subject of several biographies, some painting him as a misunderstood genius, others as a manipulative charlatan. None of them have looked seriously at his career as an agent of British Intelligence.


Using documents gleaned from British, American, French, and Italian archives, Secret Agent 666 sensationally reveals that Crowley played a major role in the sinking of the Lusitania, a plot to overthrow the government of Spain, the thwarting of Irish and Indian nationalist conspiracies, and the 1941 flight of Rudolf Hess.

The verification of the Great Beasts participation in the twentieth centurys most astounding government plots will likely blow the minds of history buff s and occult aficionados alike.

Richard B. Spence: https://www.amazon.com/Secret-Agent-666-Aleister-Intelligence/dp/1932595333

This is the story that brought him into the realm of the demonic and into contact not only with the Zozo entity, but an author with a very different background.

item.title: S12 Ep153: Hitler's Monsters: Finding the Perfect Supernatural Weapon
item.itunes:title: Hitler's Monsters: Finding the Perfect Supernatural Weapon
item.description:
Author/Investigator/Professor Eric Kurlander joins us to talk about the Nazi Germany regime and their fascination with using the Supernatural to win World war II. The regime enlisted astrology and the paranormal, paganism, IndoAryan mythology, witchcraft, miracle weapons, and the lost kingdom of Atlantis in reimagining German politics and society and recasting German science and religion. In this eye-opening history, Eric Kurlander reveals how the Third Reichs relationship to the supernatural was far from straightforward.

Eric Kurlander: https://www.amazon.com/Hitlers-Monsters-Supernatural-History-Third/dp/0300189451/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1503457651&sr=8-1&keywords=hitler%27s+monsters+a+supernatural+history+of+the+third+reich

item.title: S12 Ep118: 1967 Shag Harbour UFO incident - 50th Anniversary
item.itunes:title: 1967 Shag Harbour UFO incident - 50th Anniversary
item.description:
Jordan Bonaparte

An extraordinary event in 1967 would put the small fishing village of Shag Harbour on the map. Located at the southern tip of Nova Scotia, this rural community would play host to one of the most well documented UFO events.
The tiny fishing community has always had its stories, stories of giant sea serpents, man-eating squid, and ghost ships. The list of local colour would see one more addition to its list: a story of a visit of a mysterious flying craft of unknown origin. This craft would visit the skies and waters of Shag Harbour, permanently stamping the villages name in the public eye. This is the REAL story!

www.nighttimepodcast.com

https://shagharbourfest.eventbrite.ca

item.title: S12 Ep116: The Close Encounters Man
item.itunes:title: The Close Encounters Man
item.description:
Mark O'Connell

In June 1947, private pilot Kenneth Arnold looked out his cockpit window and saw a group of nine silvery crescents weaving between the peaks of the Cascade Mountains at an estimated 1,200 miles an hour. The media, the military, and the scientific community led by J. Allen Hynek, an astronomer hired by the Air Force debunked this and many other Unidentified Flying Object sightings reported across the country. But after years of denials, Hynek made a shocking pronouncement: UFOs are real.
This is the entertaining story of how the World's #1 Skeptic became a believer!

www.highstrangenessufo.com

https://www.facebook.com/OC360

Do you believe in ghosts? Youre not alone. For nearly two centuries, American popular culture has been influenced by the supernatural. Since the Fox sisters first reported the mysterious rappings in their New York home, mediums, magicians, and ghost hunters have played a huge part in the shaping of American history.
Tonight Troy Taylor reveals the roots of our fascination with ghosts, haunted houses, and the supernatural, and offers a rich, entertaining, and colorful look at the people, places, and eerie events that have captured the imagination of the country in some of the most outrageous and unbelievable stories in history.

item.title: S12 Ep105: Vengeful Spirits of The Witch Prison
item.itunes:title: Vengeful Spirits of The Witch Prison
item.description:
When single mother Vanessa Mitchell moved into a historic cottage in Essex, she had no idea that a paranormal nightmare was about to unfold. The cottage, known as The Cage, used to imprison those accused of witchcraft back in the 1500s. From her first day living there, Vanessa saw apparitions walk through her room, heard ghostly growls, and was even slapped and pushed by invisible hands.
Unable to handle the dark phenomena after three years, Vanessa moved out and paranormal investigator Richard Estep moved in. Tonight we discuss the years that Vanessa and Richard spent in The Cage, uncovering the frightening and fascinating mysteries of the angry spirits who lurk within it.

www.richardestep.net

item.title: S12 Ep103: UFOs: Reframing the Debate
item.itunes:title: UFOs: Reframing the Debate
item.description:
The UFO field has produced thousands of dedicated researchers over the years, and reams of literature; but to what end? What can we claim to know conclusively today about the underlying nature of UFO phenomena that we didnt know in the late-1940s? UFO study has always suffered from major organizational and methodological problems. It has also become dangerously self-referential.
If ever we are to further our understanding of the UFO enigma, we must fundamentally reframe our debate. We must wipe the board clean and fill it with new ideas, new theories, even new language. We must be willing to start from scratch when the field stagnates. We must be critical, sober, and free of dogmaready to rinse away the residue of our own beliefs.
Dave discusses the current issues and problems with the study of UFOlogy and asks what is next with his guests Robbie Graham & Susan Demeter-St. Clair.

Robbie's website: www.robbiegraham.uk
Susan's website: www.susanstclair.com

item.title: S3 Ep114: Sound Medicine: Healing Through The Human Voice - Hr.3
item.itunes:title: Sound Medicine: Healing Through The Human Voice - Hr.3
item.description:
Darkness Radio welcomes in Wayne Perry, who is truly a walking miracle!

Wayne is a stunning testament to the profound healing power of sound therapy. He has miraculously healed himself from chronic kidney, liver, and lung diseases, pulmonary hypertension, hepatitis C, and severe injuries from a near fatal auto accident in 2010! Now, FULLY RECOVERED FROM ALL, and in excellent health, he actively serves the holistic health community. For the past twenty years, he has helped to facilitate the healing of more than a 1000 others from around the world.

Wayne has also garnered international acclaim by conducting healing sessions, classes, and workshops in Great Britain, Italy, and Japan, as well as in most major cities across the United States. In 1997, his travels were highlighted when participants from various countries joined him as he conducted profound sound healing experiences for all in attendance at the sacred sites of Stonehenge in England, and within the King’s Chamber in the Great Pyramid of Giza, in Egypt.
item.itunes:author: Darkness Radio
item.dc:creator: Darkness Radio

item.title: S3 Ep105: Latitude 33:The Happiest (and Deadliest) Place on Earth - Hr.3
item.itunes:title: Latitude 33:The Happiest (and Deadliest) Place on Earth - Hr.3
item.description:
Darkness Radio welcomes in Walter Bosley for the last ytwo hours of the show for a very intriguing show about an amusement park that is very close to everyone's heart, ley lines, mysteries, and nefarious goings-on! 

Walter Bosley has been employed by the Federal Bureau of Investigation, is an inactive reserve officer in the US Air Force for which he served as a Special Agent of the AFOSI while on active duty, and then worked as a counterterrorism operational consultant for six years following military service. 

Bosley conducted an investigation into arcane science and engineering at the world's most famous theme park. Was there an inter-dimensional portal that influenced psychic perception of visitors and allowed beings to enter across time and space?

item.title: S2 Ep41: Curved Memories w/John Predovan - Hr.1
item.itunes:title: Curved Memories w/John Predovan - Hr.1
item.description: It was just another ordinary Saturday night when John was driving home from the shore. Little did he know that it would be a night that he wouldn't soon forget. Within the first year of the incident, John was periodically being tormented by eerie images and visions. For months and months he lost countless hours of sleep from these disturbing dreams. Some of them would last only for a few moments while others would last for several days. John kept silent, telling no one about these accounts as he jotted them down on paper whenever they occurred. Over the course of a couple of years, John has been trying to piece together one of the greatest mysteries that continues to elude him. As the pages were coming together, he realized that stories started slowly unfolding before his eyes. These mind-boggling events would overwhelm his soul daily the more he wrote and read about them. John relentlessly pursues the issue with the result of either taking one step forward closer to the answer or two steps backwards farther away from the truth. John Predovan Joins Darkness Radio to tell us about the story...
item.itunes:author: Darkness Radio
item.dc:creator: Darkness Radio
